name: attr-replacer
description: Chrome extension allowing for easy replacement of HTML attribute values.

scripts.popup: browserify src/popup.js -o dist/popup.js && cp assets/popup.html dist/. && cp assets/popup.css dist/.
scripts.icon: cp assets/icon-128.png dist/. && cp assets/icon-128-bnw.png dist/.
scripts.make: npm run manifest && npm run contentscript && npm run codemirror_js && npm run codemirror_css && npm run popup && npm run background && npm run icon

author: Krystian Jarmicki
